1   package com.test.vendor.mckoi;
2   
3   import com.test.AbstractTestSuite;
4   import org.junit.jupiter.api.AfterEach;
5   import org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions;
6   
7   public abstract class ConcreteMckoiSuiteIT extends AbstractTestSuite {
8   
9       public ConcreteMckoiSuiteIT() {
10          this.jdbcURL = "jdbc:mckoi://127.0.0.1/APP";
11          this.jdbcUser = "user";
12          this.jdbcPass = "password";
13  
14          this.databaseToInject = "APP";
15          this.tableToInject = "pwn";
16          this.columnToInject = "dataz";
17  
18          this.queryAssertDatabases = "select name from SYS_INFO.sUSRSchemaInfo";
19          this.queryAssertTables = String.format("""
20              select name
21              from SYS_INFO.sUSRTableInfo
22              where "schema" = '%s'
23          """, this.databaseToInject);
24          this.queryAssertColumns = String.format("""
25              select "column"
26              from SYS_INFO.sUSRTableColumns
27              where "schema" = '%s'
28              and "table" = '%s'
29          """, this.databaseToInject, this.tableToInject);
30          this.queryAssertValues = String.format("select %s from %s", this.columnToInject, this.tableToInject);
31      }
32  
33      @AfterEach
34      public void checkVendor() {
35          Assertions.assertEquals(
36              this.injectionModel.getMediatorVendor().getMckoi(),
37              this.injectionModel.getMediatorVendor().getVendor()
38          );
39      }
40  }
